abstract: Police identify body found in Hudson River as that of Vincent Viafore, who prosecutors say was killed by his fiance Angelika Graswald while kayaking near Poughkeepsie, NY in April; Graswald had previously been charged with second-degree murder after implicating herself under police questioning, though defense attorney claims statements were coerced.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers for Angelika Graswald, who was charged with murder after her fiancé, Vincent Viafore, disappeared, confirmed the identification.

headline.main: Body Recovered in Hudson Is Identified as Missing Kayaker’s
headline.print_headline: Body Found in Hudson Is Said to Be of Kayaker

snippet: Lawyers for Angelika Graswald, who was charged with murder after her fiancé, Vincent Viafore, disappeared, confirmed the identification.
